text: haey( yeung ban banhchoun) shou eb towkean mea t yea n del chea bangobaaun robsa puokke haey keat ban pol tha chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh ning sangkhum( tha nung ttuol ban kar tabasnang la) now thngai barlok choh . haey chaur puok anak kom bangk vineasakamm now leu phendei nih aoy saoh
